text: 6:4 1 Korin 8:2; 1 Timoti 1:4; 1:7; 2 Timoti 2:23; Taitus 3:9gumazim o amizir kam uan nɨghnɨzibara ifuegha uabɨra uabɨ fe, egha bizitam gɨfozir puvatɨ. A nɨghnɨzir kuram ikia, arɨava onganizɨ moghɨn, akabar gumazibagh afighasa, pura bizir muziariba bagha akabar uari adoghodosi. Akar kamaghɨn amiba, da gumazamizibagh amima men naviba gumazamizir igharaziba bagha men derazir puvatɨ, egha uari abɨgha, gumazamizibar ziabagh asɨghasɨgha, nɨghnɨzir kurabar igharaz darazigh amua,
